Row.sql: WITH allevents AS( (SELECT ae.uid, (DATEDIFF(ss, eventtime, LEAD(eventtime) OVER (ORDER BY eventtime)) / 3600.0) as timevalue, reasontreenodeuid, rn.rootreason as reasonname, m.name FROM availabilityevent ae INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON ae.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN model m ON ae.modeluid = m.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON ae.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON ae.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (ae.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (ae.eventtime >= [[startDate]] OR [[startDate]] IS NULL) AND (ae.eventtime <= [[endDate]] OR [[endDate]] IS NULL) AND (ae.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (rc.reasoncategoryuid = [[reasonCategoryUid]] OR [[reasonCategoryUid]] IS NULL)) UNION (SELECT pe.uid, pe.quantity * pe.idealcycletime as timevalue, reasontreenodeuid, ISNULL(rn.rootreason, 'Good') as reasonname, m.name FROM productionevent pe INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON pe.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN model m ON pe.modeluid = m.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON pe.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON pe.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (pe.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (pe.eventtime >= [[startDate]] OR [[startDate]] IS NULL) AND (pe.eventtime <= [[endDate]] OR [[endDate]] IS NULL) AND (pe.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (rc.reasoncategoryuid = [[reasonCategoryUid]] OR [[reasonCategoryUid]] IS NULL) AND rn.rootreason IS NOT NULL) UNION (SELECT le.uid, le.lossvalue / 3600.0 as timevalue, reasontreenodeuid, rn.rootreason as reasonname, m.name FROM lossevent le INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON le.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN model m ON le.modeluid = m.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON le.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON le.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (le.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (le.eventtime >= [[startDate]] OR [[startDate]] IS NULL) AND (le.eventtime <= [[endDate]] OR [[endDate]] IS NULL) AND (le.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (rc.reasoncategoryuid = [[reasonCategoryUid]] OR [[reasonCategoryUid]] IS NULL)) ) SELECT name as thingname, reasonname, sum(timevalue) as time FROM allevents ae WHERE reasonname != 'Running' GROUP BY name, reasonname ORDER BY name

WITH models AS ( --initialization SELECT ml1.childuid, ml1.parentuid, m1.ispacemaker, m1.name, m1.modeltypeuid FROM modellink ml1 INNER JOIN model m1 ON ml1.childuid = m1.uid WHERE parentuid = [[modelUid]] UNION ALL --recursive execution SELECT ml2.childuid, ml2.parentuid, m2.ispacemaker, m2.name, m2.modeltypeuid FROM modellink ml2 INNER JOIN models s ON ml2.parentuid = s.childuid INNER JOIN model m2 ON ml2.childuid = m2.uid ) SELECT * FROM models WHERE ispacemaker = 1

SELECT name FROM reasoncategory WHERE uid = (SELECT reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree WHERE uid = (SELECT reasontreeuid FROM reasontreenode WHERE uid = (SELECT reasontreenodeuid FROM machinecode WHERE codevalue = [[machineCode]] AND modeluid = (SELECT uid FROM model WHERE thingname = [[thingName]]))))

SELECT distinct(actualstarttime), FORMAT(actualstarttime, N'MM-dd hh:mm tt') + ' (24h)' as display FROM shiftinstance WHERE actualstarttime >= [[startTime]] AND actualendtime <= [[endTime]] AND (modeluid = [[modelUid]] OR [[modelUid]] IS NULL) ORDER BY actualstarttime

WITH allevents AS( (SELECT 'Time Loss' as eventtype, ae.uid, eventtime, (DATEDIFF(ss, eventtime, LEAD(eventtime) OVER (ORDER BY eventtime)) / 3600.0) as timevalue, 0 as quantity, reasontreenodeuid, rn.parentreason, rn.rootreason as reasonname, notes, shiftinstanceuid, si.actualstarttime as shiftstarttime, materialmasteruid, mm.id as materialid, joborderuid, jo.id as joborderid, ae.isautomation, ae.modeluid, m.thingname, LEAD(eventtime) OVER (ORDER BY eventtime) as eventendtime, rc.reasoncategoryuid, m.ispacemaker, si.name as shiftname FROM availabilityevent ae INNER JOIN joborder jo ON ae.joborderuid = jo.uid INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON ae.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT si2.uid, si2.actualstarttime, s.name FROM shiftinstance si2 INNER JOIN shift s on si2.shiftuid = s.uid) si ON ae.shiftinstanceuid = si.uid INNER JOIN model m ON ae.modeluid = m.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON ae.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON ae.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (ae.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (ae.eventtime >= [[startTime]] OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (ae.eventtime <= DATEADD(hh, 24, [[startTime]]) OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (ae.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (jo.id LIKE [[jobOrderUid]] + '%' OR [[jobOrderUid]] IS NULL)) UNION (SELECT IIF(ISNULL(rn.rootreason, 'Good')='Good', 'Good Production', 'Scrap') as eventtype, pe.uid, eventtime, 0 as timevalue, pe.quantity, reasontreenodeuid, ISNULL(rn.parentreason, 'Good') as parentreason, ISNULL(rn.rootreason, 'Good') as reasonname, notes, shiftinstanceuid, si.actualstarttime as shiftstarttime, materialmasteruid, mm.id as materialid, joborderuid, jo.id as joborderid, pe.isautomation, pe.modeluid, m.thingname, NULL as eventendtime, rc.reasoncategoryuid, m.ispacemaker, si.name as shiftname FROM productionevent pe INNER JOIN joborder jo ON pe.joborderuid = jo.uid INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON pe.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT si2.uid, si2.actualstarttime, s.name FROM shiftinstance si2 INNER JOIN shift s on si2.shiftuid = s.uid) si ON pe.shiftinstanceuid = si.uid INNER JOIN model m ON pe.modeluid = m.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON pe.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON pe.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (pe.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (pe.eventtime >= [[startTime]] OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (pe.eventtime <= DATEADD(hh, 24, [[startTime]]) OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (pe.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (jo.id LIKE [[jobOrderUid]] + '%' OR [[jobOrderUid]] IS NULL)) UNION (SELECT 'Time Loss' as eventtype, le.uid, eventtime, le.lossvalue / 3600.0 as timevalue, 0 as quantity, reasontreenodeuid, rn.parentreason, rn.rootreason as reasonname, notes, shiftinstanceuid, si.actualstarttime as shiftstarttime, materialmasteruid, mm.id as materialid, joborderuid, jo.id as joborderid, 0 as isautomation, le.modeluid, m.thingname, NULL as eventendtime, rc.reasoncategoryuid, m.ispacemaker, si.name as shiftname FROM lossevent le INNER JOIN joborder jo ON le.joborderuid = jo.uid INNER JOIN materialmaster mm ON le.materialmasteruid = mm.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT si2.uid, si2.actualstarttime, s.name FROM shiftinstance si2 INNER JOIN shift s on si2.shiftuid = s.uid) si ON le.shiftinstanceuid = si.uid INNER JOIN model m ON le.modeluid = m.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT rtn1.uid, rt.reasoncategoryuid FROM reasontree rt INNER JOIN reasontreenode rtn1 ON rt.uid = rtn1.reasontreeuid) rc ON le.reasontreenodeuid = rc.uid INNER JOIN (SELECT r1.name parentreason, r2.name as rootreason, frt.rootuid, frt.parentreasontreenodeuid FROM (SELECT prtn.reasonuid, rrtn.uid as rootuid, prtn.uid as parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.reasonuid as rootreason FROM reasontreenode rrtn LEFT JOIN reasontreenode prtn ON ISNULL(rrtn.parentreasontreenodeuid, rrtn.uid) = prtn.uid) frt INNER JOIN reason r1 ON frt.reasonuid = r1.uid INNER JOIN reason r2 ON frt.rootreason = r2.uid) rn ON le.reasontreenodeuid = rn.rootuid WHERE (le.modeluid IN (<<modelUids>>) OR [[modelUids]] IS NULL) AND (le.eventtime >= [[startTime]] OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (le.eventtime <= DATEADD(hh, 24, [[startTime]]) OR [[startTime]] IS NULL) AND (le.materialmasteruid = [[materialMasterUid]] OR [[materialMasterUid]] IS NULL) AND (jo.id LIKE [[jobOrderUid]] + '%' OR [[jobOrderUid]] IS NULL)) ) SELECT thingname, shiftname + ' - ' + FORMAT(shiftstarttime, N'MMM-dd hh:mm tt') as shiftname, shiftstarttime, joborderid, eventtype, IIF(parentreason=reasonname, aerc.name, parentreason) as parentreason , reasonname, sum(timevalue) as time, sum(quantity) as quantity FROM allevents ae LEFT JOIN reasoncategory aerc ON ae.reasoncategoryuid = aerc.uid WHERE (timevalue > 0 OR quantity > 0) AND (reasonname != 'Running') GROUP BY thingname, joborderid, shiftstarttime, eventtype, reasonname, parentreason, aerc.name, shiftname ORDER BY thingname, joborderid, shiftstarttime, eventtype

WITH models AS ( --initialization SELECT ml1.childuid, ml1.parentuid, m1.ispacemaker, m1.name, m1.modeltypeuid FROM modellink ml1 INNER JOIN model m1 ON ml1.childuid = m1.uid WHERE parentuid = [[modelUid]] UNION ALL --recursive execution SELECT ml2.childuid, ml2.parentuid, m2.ispacemaker, m2.name, m2.modeltypeuid FROM modellink ml2 INNER JOIN models s ON ml2.parentuid = s.childuid INNER JOIN model m2 ON ml2.childuid = m2.uid ) SELECT * FROM models WHERE modeltypeuid = (SELECT uid FROM modeltype WHERE name = 'Workunit')

FieldDefinition.description: Automatically enable timer on startup
FieldDefinition.name: enabled

FieldDefinition.name: runAsUser

FieldDefinition.description: Update rate
FieldDefinition.name: updateRate

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table for any Things that need to be configured. This allows for OOTB things to be customized, and the new version that should be used can be configured here
ConfigurationTable.name: ThingConfiguration

FieldDefinition.name: id

StateDefinition.name: PTCDTS.Reports.SummaryReportEvent

ThingTemplate.description: Block to hold SQL and Report Functions for PTCDTS.Reports Custom UI
ThingTemplate.name: PTCDTS.Reports.Manager_TT

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table used to identify managers that the building block should use
ConfigurationTable.name: ManagerConfiguration

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier for the manager that needs to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the Manager Thing to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: managerThingName

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier used to identify the thing or mashup that is being configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: name of the mashup to configure
FieldDefinition.name: mashupName

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table for dynamic menus. Menu Items can be specified here and they will show up for the given menu name.
ConfigurationTable.name: MenuConfiguration

FieldDefinition.description: An optional field to indicate the ordering of the menu items
FieldDefinition.name: menuOrderPreference

FieldDefinition.description: Localization table key for the optional section that groups like menus together
FieldDefinition.name: menuSectionKey

FieldDefinition.description: Localization table key for the menu label
FieldDefinition.name: menuTitleKey

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table for any Things that need to be configured. This allows for OOTB things to be customized, and the new version that should be used can be configured here
ConfigurationTable.name: ThingConfiguration

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier used to identify the thing or mashup that is being configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the Thing entity or Mashup entity that is to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: thingName

ThingTemplate.description: Block to hold SQL and Report Functions for PTCDTS.Reports Custom UI
ThingTemplate.name: PTCDTS.Reports.EntryPoint_TT

ConfigurationTable.description: Configuration table to store the components core manager
ConfigurationTable.name: ComponentManager

FieldDefinition.description: unique identifier for the manager that needs to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the Manager Thing to be configured
FieldDefinition.name: managerThingName
